verses.verse: And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out from the <S%G2413>temple<s%> and was <S%G4198>going<s%> <S%G4198>away<s%> <S%G2532>when<s%> His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> up to <S%G1925>point<s%> out the <S%G2413>temple<s%> <S%G3619>buildings<s%> to Him.

And He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "Do you not <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%>? <S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, not one <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> shall be <S%G863>left<s%> upon <S%G3037>another,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> will not be <S%G2647>torn<s%> <S%G2647>down.<s%>"

And as He was <S%G2521>sitting<s%> on the <S%G3735>Mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives,<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to Him <S%G2596>privately,<s%> <S%G2398><s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3004>"Tell<s%> us, <S%G4219>when<s%> will <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> be, and <S%G5101>what<s%> [will be] the <S%G4592>sign<s%> of Your <S%G3952>coming,<s%> and of the <S%G4930>end<s%> of the <S%G165>age<s%>?"
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G991>"See<s%> to it that <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G4105>misleads<s%> you.
"For <S%G4183>many<s%> will <S%G2064>come<s%> in My <S%G3686>name,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> 'I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>' and will <S%G4105>mislead<s%> <S%G4183>many.<s%>

"And you <S%G3195>will<s%> be <S%G191>hearing<s%> of <S%G4171>wars<s%> and <S%G189>rumors<s%> of <S%G4171>wars;<s%> <S%G3708>see<s%> that you are not <S%G2360>frightened,<s%> for [those things] <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1096>take<s%> <S%G1096>place,<s%> but [that] is not <S%G3768>yet<s%> the <S%G5056>end.<s%>

"For <S%G1484>nation<s%> will <S%G1453>rise<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G1484>nation,<s%> and <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> and in <S%G2596>various<s%> <S%G5117>places<s%> there will be <S%G3042>famines<s%> and <S%G4578>earthquakes.<s%>
"But <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> are [merely] the <S%G746>beginning<s%> of <S%G5604>birth<s%> <S%G5604>pangs.<s%>

<S%G5119>"Then<s%> they will <S%G3860>deliver<s%> you to <S%G2347>tribulation,<s%> and will <S%G615>kill<s%> you, and you will be <S%G3404>hated<s%> by <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> on <S%G1223>account<s%> of My <S%G3686>name.<s%>

"And at that <S%G5119>time<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> will <S%G4624>fall<s%> <S%G4624>away<s%> and will <S%G3860>deliver<s%> up <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another<s%> and <S%G3404>hate<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another.<s%>
"And <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5578>false<s%> <S%G5578>prophets<s%> will <S%G1453>arise,<s%> and will <S%G4105>mislead<s%> <S%G4183>many.<s%>
"And <S%G1223>because<s%> <S%G458>lawlessness<s%> is <S%G4129>increased,<s%> <S%G4183>most<s%> people's <S%G26>love<s%> will <S%G5594>grow<s%> <S%G5594>cold.<s%>
"But the one who <S%G5278>endures<s%> to the <S%G5056>end,<s%> he shall be <S%G4982>saved.<s%>

"And <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> shall be <S%G2784>preached<s%> in the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3625>world<s%> for a <S%G3142>witness<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>nations,<s%> and <S%G5119>then<s%> the <S%G5056>end<s%> shall <S%G2240>come.<s%>

<S%G3767>"Therefore<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> you <S%G3708>see<s%> the <S%G946>abomination<s%> of <S%G2050>desolation<s%> which was <S%G3004>spoken<s%> of <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G1158>Daniel<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> in the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> (let the <S%G314>reader<s%> <S%G3539>understand<s%>),
<S%G5119>then<s%> let <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> are in <S%G2453>Judea<s%> <S%G5343>flee<s%> to the <S%G3735>mountains;<s%>
let him <S%G3588>who<s%> is on the <S%G1430>housetop<s%> not <S%G2597>go<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> to <S%G142>get<s%> the things out that are in his <S%G3614>house;<s%>
and let him <S%G3588>who<s%> is in the <S%G68>field<s%> not <S%G1994>turn<s%> <S%G3694>back<s%> <S%G1994><s%> to <S%G142>get<s%> his <S%G2440>cloak.<s%>
"But <S%G3759>woe<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who are with <S%G1722>child<s%> <S%G1064><s%> and to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2337>nurse<s%> <S%G2337>babes<s%> in <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days!<s%>
"But <S%G4336>pray<s%> that your <S%G5437>flight<s%> may not be in the <S%G5494>winter,<s%> <S%G3366>or<s%> on a <S%G4521>Sabbath;<s%>

for <S%G5119>then<s%> there will be a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2347>tribulation,<s%> <S%G3634>such<s%> as has not <S%G1096>occurred<s%> <S%G575>since<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G3568>now,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G3756>ever<s%> <S%G3361><s%> shall.

"And <S%G1487>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> had been <S%G2856>cut<s%> <S%G2856>short,<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G4561>life<s%> would have been <S%G4982>saved;<s%> but for the <S%G1223>sake<s%> of the <S%G1588>elect<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> shall be <S%G2856>cut<s%> <S%G2856>short.<s%>

<S%G5119>"Then<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> to you, <S%G2400>'Behold,<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> is the <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>' <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5602>'There<s%> [He is,]' do not <S%G4100>believe<s%> [him.]

"For <S%G5580>false<s%> <S%G5580>Christs<s%> and <S%G5578>false<s%> <S%G5578>prophets<s%> will <S%G1453>arise<s%> and will <S%G1325>show<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> and <S%G5059>wonders,<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> as to <S%G4105>mislead,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1415>possible,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G1588>elect.<s%>
<S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%G4275>told<s%> you in <S%G4275>advance.<s%>

<S%G1437>"If<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> they <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G2400>'Behold,<s%> He is in the <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%>' do not <S%G1831>go<s%> <S%G1831>forth,<s%> [or,] <S%G2400>'Behold,<s%> He is in the <S%G5009>inner<s%> <S%G5009>rooms,<s%>' do not <S%G4100>believe<s%> [them.]

"For <S%G5618>just<s%> as the <S%G796>lightning<s%> <S%G1831>comes<s%> from the <S%G395>east,<s%> and <S%G5316>flashes<s%> <S%G2193>even<s%> to the <S%G1424>west,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> shall the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> be.
<S%G3699>"Wherever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> the <S%G4430>corpse<s%> is, <S%G1563>there<s%> the <S%G105>vultures<s%> will <S%G4863>gather.<s%>

"But <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G2347>tribulation<s%> of <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> the <S%G2246>sun<s%> will be <S%G4654>darkened,<s%> and the <S%G4582>moon<s%> will not <S%G1325>give<s%> its <S%G5338>light,<s%> and the <S%G792>stars<s%> will <S%G4098>fall<s%> from the <S%G3772>sky,<s%> and the <S%G1411>powers<s%> of the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> will be <S%G4531>shaken,<s%>

and <S%G5119>then<s%> the <S%G4592>sign<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> will <S%G5316>appear<s%> in the <S%G3772>sky,<s%> and <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G5443>tribes<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> will <S%G2875>mourn,<s%> and they will <S%G3708>see<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> on the <S%G3507>clouds<s%> of the <S%G3772>sky<s%> with <S%G1411>power<s%> and <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G1391>glory.<s%>

"And He will <S%G649>send<s%> <S%G649>forth<s%> His <S%G32>angels<s%> with a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4536>trumpet<s%> and they will <S%G1996>gather<s%> <S%G1996>together<s%> His <S%G1588>elect<s%> from the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G417>winds,<s%> from one <S%G206>end<s%> of the <S%G3772>sky<s%> to the <S%G206>other.<s%>

<S%G1161>"Now<s%> <S%G3129>learn<s%> the <S%G3850>parable<s%> from the <S%G4808>fig<s%> <S%G4808>tree:<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> its <S%G2798>branch<s%> has <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G527>tender,<s%> and <S%G1631>puts<s%> <S%G1631>forth<s%> its <S%G5444>leaves,<s%> you <S%G1097>know<s%> that <S%G2330>summer<s%> is <S%G1451>near;<s%>

even <S%G3779>so<s%> you <S%G2532>too,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> you <S%G3708>see<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> <S%G1097>recognize<s%> that He is <S%G1451>near,<s%> [right] at the <S%G2374>door.<s%>

<S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%> will not <S%G3928>pass<s%> <S%G3928>away<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> <S%G1096>take<s%> <S%G1096>place.<s%>
<S%G3772>"Heaven<s%> and <S%G1093>earth<s%> will <S%G3928>pass<s%> <S%G3928>away,<s%> but My <S%G3056>words<s%> shall not <S%G3928>pass<s%> <S%G3928>away.<s%>

"But of that <S%G2250>day<s%> and <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G3609>knows,<s%> not <S%G3761>even<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> the <S%G5207>Son,<s%> but the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3441>alone.<s%>
"For the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> will be <S%G5618>just<s%> <S%G5618>like<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G3575>Noah.<s%>

"For as in <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> which were <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G2627>flood<s%> they were <S%G5176>eating<s%> and <S%G4095>drinking,<s%> they were <S%G1060>marrying<s%> and <S%G7031>giving<s%> in <S%G7031>marriage,<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> that <S%G3575>Noah<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> the <S%G2787>ark,<s%>

and they did not <S%G1097>understand<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G2627>flood<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G142>took<s%> them <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G142>away;<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> shall the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> be.
<S%G5119>"Then<s%> there shall be <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G1417>men<s%> in the <S%G68>field;<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> will be <S%G3880>taken,<s%> and <S%G1520>one<s%> will be <S%G863>left.<s%>
<S%G1417>"Two<s%> women [will be] <S%G229>grinding<s%> at the <S%G3458>mill;<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> will be <S%G3880>taken,<s%> and <S%G1520>one<s%> will be <S%G863>left.<s%>
<S%G3767>"Therefore<s%> be on the <S%G1127>alert,<s%> for you do not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G4169>which<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> your <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is <S%G2064>coming.<s%>

"But be <S%G1097>sure<s%> of <S%G1565>this,<s%> that <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G3617>head<s%> of the <S%G3617>house<s%> had <S%G3609>known<s%> at <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G5438>time<s%> of the <S%G5438>night<s%> the <S%G2812>thief<s%> was <S%G2064>coming,<s%> he would have been on the <S%G1127>alert<s%> and would not have <S%G1439>allowed<s%> his <S%G3614>house<s%> to be <S%G1358>broken<s%> into.

"For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>reason<s%> you be <S%G2092>ready<s%> <S%G2532>too;<s%> for the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> is <S%G2064>coming<s%> at an <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G3739>when<s%> you do not <S%G1380>think<s%> [He will.]

<S%G5101>"Who<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> is the <S%G4103>faithful<s%> and <S%G5429>sensible<s%> <S%G1401>slave<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> his <S%G2962>master<s%> <S%G2525>put<s%> in <S%G2525>charge<s%> of his <S%G3610>household<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> them their <S%G5160>food<s%> at the <S%G2540>proper<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%>?
<S%G3107>"Blessed<s%> is that <S%G1401>slave<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> his <S%G2962>master<s%> <S%G2147>finds<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G4160>doing<s%> when he <S%G2064>comes.<s%>
<S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, that he will <S%G2525>put<s%> him in <S%G2525>charge<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G5225>possessions.<s%>

"But <S%G1437>if<s%> that <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G1401>slave<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> in his <S%G2588>heart,<s%> 'My <S%G2962>master<s%> is not <S%G5549>coming<s%> for a <S%G5549>long<s%> <S%G5549>time,<s%>'
and shall <S%G757>begin<s%> to <S%G5180>beat<s%> his <S%G4889>fellow<s%> <S%G4889>slaves<s%> and <S%G2068>eat<s%> and <S%G4095>drink<s%> with <S%G3184>drunkards;<s%>

the <S%G2962>master<s%> of that <S%G1401>slave<s%> will <S%G2240>come<s%> on a <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3739>when<s%> he does not <S%G4328>expect<s%> [him] and at an <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he does not <S%G1097>know,<s%>

and shall <S%G1371>cut<s%> him in <S%G1371>pieces<s%> and <S%G5087>assign<s%> him a <S%G3313>place<s%> with the <S%G5273>hypocrites;<s%> <S%G2805>weeping<s%> shall be <S%G1563>there<s%> and the <S%G1030>gnashing<s%> of <S%G3599>teeth.<s%>
